Post Zero

Welcome to my blog

Posted on 30 Oct 2014 by Filip Wieland

This is probably not going to be very interesting, as I’m just setting up the Jekyll site.

What’s this about?

I’m starting a blog documenting my experiences with programming, the internet, and a range of other things. I will also use this space to tell you more about the development of Ipsum and other projects.

I’ll probably be integrating Disqus as my comment system soon enough.
